document_data.name: Vellgard Manor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vellgard Manor''' was a villa located in the [[Blacklake District]] of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Description: The manor was flanked by metal gates and an inner wall that could stop a small army.
document_data.History: [[Mordai Vell]] inherited the manor after the eruption of [[Mount Hotenow]], in [[1451 DR]], when all his human relatives died in the cataclysm. He then repurposed the manor to use it as the headquarters of his [[Ashmadai]] cell.
